origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FinanceRegulationAPI.analyze_policy', 'description': 'This function analyzes the impact of financial regulations on different sectors, evaluates their effect on the market, and provides strategic advice based on the policy type.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'policyType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of financial regulation policy, e.g., banking, securities, insurance.'}, {'name': 'impactAssessment', 'type': 'BOOLEAN', 'description': 'Whether to include an impact assessment on financial institutions.'}, {'name': 'marketEffect', 'type': 'BOOLEAN', 'description': 'Whether to analyze the effect on financial markets.'}, {'name': 'strategyAdvice', 'type': 'BOOLEAN', 'description': 'Whether to provide strategic advice for compliance.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'analysisReport', 'description': 'A detailed report on the analysis of the financial regulation policy.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FinanceRegulationAPI.analyze_policy, 它的参数输入如下: 'policyType'是'banking', 'impactAssessment'是'true', 'marketEffect'是'true', 'strategyAdvice'是'true'.
